title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set.
description: Upon attempting to create a new table group without setting a dataset, an error is displayed. However, as per the template requirements, the UI should not perform validation.
OB: An error is shown when trying to create a new table group without setting a dataset.
EB:
Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set. To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a table report item. 
2. Do not set the dataset. 
3. Try creating a new table group. 
4. User should be able to go and define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Add a table report item. 
2. Do not set the dataset. 
3. Try creating a new table group. 
4. Observe that the group dialog is not shown. 
5. Expected behavior: The group dialog should be shown.
